Have for sale this T227 Chief Bender card. Graded PSA 1. See scans below for condition. Asking $325 dlvd in the US. Payment by check (will hold to clear), money order, or Paypal friends and family. Regular Paypal is fine, if you cover the fees.  Any questions, please let me know.

Thanks
DJ
[url]x2drich2000@yahoo.com[/url]
